activities: Personal employee information is used  for employment related obligations, evaluation and administration of compensation and benefits, auditing,accounting and financial analysis and facilitating business communications and negotiations.
eucountries: Belgium, Czech Republic, France, Germany, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
recoursemech:
Etrust will be our independent dispute resolution company through our Ethics Hotline managed by Expolink out of the UK.

If a complaint regarding Laird Technologies, Inc. use of Personal Information is raised by an EU Based Employee, Laird Technologies, Inc. investigate and try to resolve any dispute. If the dispute cannot be resolved, Laird Technologies, Inc. will participate in the dispute resolution procedures of the panel established by the European Data Protection Authorities (EU DPAs).
